author: weaver
msg: stopping the DS was causing issues.  It appears that even if I closed a PersistenceBroker in OJB
(which I do in the PersistenceSupportedTestCase) OJB itslef still hangs on to an instance of the previous
, which was being closed in tearDown, instead of re-grabbing from the JNDI.

author: weaver
msg: added the ability to unbind a specific name.
